page.title: 18LOCAL INDUSTRY
page.content: dogs but there are some men who go around the area of Richard Lees in blue vans. They have safety precautions by having training courses and supervised workers. The office people's hours are 9 am till 5pm. The factory people work two shifts; one is 6 am till 5 pm the other 2 pm till 10 pm. The whole company covers 15 acres of land. The people at Richard Lees start work at 16 years. The boss of the company is Mr. McPherson. They have 50,000 square metres of concrete slabs in the storage yard. The waste concrete slabs are disposed of at Highfields Lane near Leasows Farm. They are tipped into a large hole, from which sand was previously extracted. There used to be sand_ martins' nests in the quarry, but the sand-martins are no longer there.
